summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1217 m), feels like temperature (up 2.8°C), outside temperature (up 2.4°C), and inside temperature (up 2.0°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 266.2m higher than yesterday, 602.5m lower than the past week, 1216.6m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 765m to a maximum of 2220m, averaging 1531.9m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2130m and 2750m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, humidity will be high and noticeable. Chance of light rain, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and sunlight levels will peak at very high intensity. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
